# NSScrollView.Elasticity.automatic

**Case**

Automatically determine whether to allow elasticity on this axis.

## Declaration

```swift
case automatic
```

## Constants

- **NSScrollView.Elasticity.none**: Disallow scrolling beyond document bounds on this axis.
- **NSScrollView.Elasticity.allowed**: Allow content to be scrolled past its bounds on this axis in an elastic fashion.
